title: Authenticating stuck
body: Hi. Can't authorize. Authenticating stuck. Does anyone have a similar problem?

replies.body: Not seeing any issues here, but I'll keep an eye out.  In the meantime, your network might be blocking you from communicating with the authentication server.  See if our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help by auto-configuring firewall settings.  I hope that helps!
